All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
GameController
Controller for the game screen Handles word generation, level progression,timing and user input
GameLogic
GameLogic handles the words and timing logic of the typing game.
GameState
Holds the global game state across different scenes Stores current level, number of successful levels and failed attempts
LostController
Controller for the Game over screen Handles navigation after losing a game
Main
Entry point of the JavaFX application
MenuController
Controller for the main menu scene Handles navigation to the game scene Handles navigation to the help scene Help on return button functionalities
SceneManager
Utility class to manage scene changes in the project
StatsController
Controller for statistics screen Displays the player's performance after the game
